import React from "react"; import { Card, CardGroup, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Search } from "react-router-dom"; import "./courses.css"; const CardGrid = () => { const SearchCourse = () => { const input = document.getElementById("filter").value.toUpperCase() const card = document.getElementsByClassName("card") for (let i = 0; i < card.length; i++) { var title = card[i].querySelector(".card-title") if (title.innerText.toUpperCase().indexOf(input) > -1) { card[i].style.display = "" } else { card[i].style.display="none" } } } return (
